title: Strengthening Medical Practice Competencies: Self-Directed Nursing Protocol for External Ventricular Drain Management in Adult Patients

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: The learner can describe the basic structure and function of an External Ventricular Drain (EVD)
The learner can perform core steps of infection control and safety protocols related to EVD with 80% accuracy
The learner can form a PBL (Problem-Based Learning) team to propose and evaluate problem-solving strategies for EVD patient care scenarios
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
